dcterms:description: The dataset includes Houston 2013 and Houston 2018 scenes, which were obtained by different sensors on the University of Houston campus and its vicinity in different years. The Houston 2013 dataset is composed of 349×1905 pixels, including 144 spectral bands, and the Houston 2018 dataset has 48 spectral bands.
dcterms:title: Houston Dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Le Saux
N. Yokoya
R. Hansch
S. Prasad
dcterms:description: The Pavia dataset includes University of Pavia and Pavia Center scenes, both having the same seven classes. The Pavia Center has 1096×715 pixels and 102 bands, while the University of Pavia has 610×340 pixels and 103 spectral bands.
dcterms:title: Pavia Dataset

dcterms:creator: X.-Y. Tong
G.-S. Xia
Q. Lu
H. Shen
S. Li
S. You
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: The GID dataset is constructed by Wuhan University and contains multispectral images taken at different times in many regions of China. It includes images shot in Nanchang and Wuhan, with the same spatial and spectral resolution.
dcterms:title: GID (Gaofen Image Dataset)
